# RETRO-ICA - Authentic Vintage Electronics

## About
RETRO-ICA specializes in authentic, tested, retro electronics. We offer professionally refurbished vintage electronics with detailed condition ratings.

## Product Categories

### Photography
- Point and Shoot Film Cameras (point-n-shoot)
- Medium Format Cameras (medium-format)
- APS Film Cameras (aps)
- SLR Film Cameras (slr)
- Pocket Digital Cameras (pocket-digicam)
- Sony Digital Cameras (sony-digicam)
- Superzoom Digital Cameras (superzoom-digicam)
- DSLR Cameras (dslr)
- Y2K Digital Cameras (y2k-digital)

### Video
- Super 8 Film Cameras (super8)
- Film Movie Cameras (film-movie)
- Tape Camcorders (camcoder-tape)
- DVD Camcorders (camcoder-dvd)
- SD & HDD Camcorders (camcoder-sd-hdd)

### Audio/Music
- Cassette Players & Walkmans (cassette)
- Vinyl Record Players (vinyl)
- Vintage Boomboxes (boombox)
- iPods & MP3 Players (ipods)
- CD Players (cd-players)
- Vintage Speakers (speakers)
- Classic iPods Collection (classic-ipods)

### Accessories
- Camera Bags & Cases (bags)
- Film Rolls (film)
- Camera Flash Units (flash)
- Camera Tripods (tripods)
- Camera Filters (filters)
- Camera Cleaning Kits (cleaning)

### Featured Collections
- Olympus Mju Series (olympus-mju)
- Retro Kodak Cameras (retro-kodak)
- Y2K Sony Cameras (y2k-sony)
- Gameboys & Handheld Gaming (gameboys)

## Browse
- All Photography: https://retroica.com/photo
- All Video Equipment: https://retroica.com/video
- All Audio/Music: https://retroica.com/music
- All Accessories: https://retroica.com/accessories
